ComicInfo.Title: Lucky Legs!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 07:37:40. [CVDB145141] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:48:23. [Issue ID 243491]
ComicInfo.Characters: Elvira Mistress of the Dark,Roz Wyck,Spooky Suzie,Pierce,Leonardo Dicrappio,Billy Beau Braggard
ComicInfo.Summary: Lucky Legs!: Elvira begins training to look her best for the upcoming "Miss Lucky Legs" beauty pageant at the Citrus Bowl. The grand prize is a date with heartthrob Leonardo Dicrapprio. Elvira is being badly shown up by one of the other contestants until she is revealed to be an alien in disguise. Elvira wins. For her date with Dicrappio, she has him wash, wax and clean her car.
